website_summaries.verdict: The Merrell Around Town Mid Lace, as the name suggests, is a mid-top shoe with a lace-up type of closure. A significant number of purchasers describe this shoe as affordable or worth the buy, surprisingly lightweight, comfortable, and stylish. The leather upper is soft and pleasing, making the shoe ideal for everyday casual wear for the ladies.
pros: The Merrell Around Town Mid Lace is a lightweight but sturdy shoe, which left several reviewers satisfied
It is an affordable pair of mid-top shoe
Several reviewers were beyond pleased with the quality of this shoe from Merrell
Some buyers commended this shoe for being comfortable right out of the box
It does not need to be broken in
This is the kind of shoe that suits well in casual styling, claimed by some of those who own a pair
The majority of the purchasers liked the style and look of this shoe
There were some positive comments on how soft and comfortable the leather material used in the Merrell Around Town Mid Lace shoe
cons: The colorways available for the Merrell Around Town Mid Lace are limited in numbers
A few buyers were somehow disappointed with the minimal arch support of this shoe
One reviewer pointed out that the sole does not have an aggressive tread and is relatively thin
Another reviewer said that this shoe is difficult to get on and off

customer_reviews.title: Needs more cushioning
customer_reviews.text: I like these shoes enough to keep them but would have appreciated a little more cushioning. I will try adding an extra inner liner. They're not terribly warm, either, but as I'm in a temperate climate, that's not a huge issue. I like that they're lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: KellKat

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are great accept for the fact that the top of the ...
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are great accept for the fact that the top of the sole wears out quickly. Its been 3 months with these shoes and a hole where the leather meets the edge of the sole. This is very disappointing because i love these shoes and at $100 they should last longer...... I'm really sad to see these fall apart so soon.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Peters

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. I'm a size 7.5, ordered a 7, and they fit fine, but definitely not tight. Light and easy to wear and look great. I find the arch support sufficient for a city walking shoe, they're definitely not hiking shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: These are great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! They look great, and they are supportive for my plantar fasciitis. Nice soft soles. I like them so much I bought a second pair! I get many compliments on them.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Terry

customer_reviews.title: Boxes need to be inspected better before shipping
customer_reviews.text: Shoes would probably have been ok. Received with no shoe laces... returned.
customer_reviews.author: Lee A

customer_reviews.title: Love these ankle boots!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these ankle boots!! Wear them almost everywhere...difficult to put on another pair of shoes when I glance at them in my closest. I'd give them 10 stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: I really like my new shoes! They are comfortable and really lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: AMCG

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great boot! Love them! Just as pictured. Color is true. Size runs a little big.
customer_reviews.author: Rochelle Boyle

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I have this shoe in a different color and love Them
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Pattillo

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, high quality shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are so incredibly light on my feet. They look as nice as the ads that drew me to buy them in the first place. I am a 10.5, and ordered a 10. I still have a little room, but since they are laced all the way up, the extra room is actually great because I can choose different thicknesses of socks to wear. They are a little stiff at the ankle and caused some pain for the first couple days, but I can tell they are already loosening up. The only problem I have is that they don't have a "pull on" strap in the back - so getting them on and off is not easy.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley B.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and practical
customer_reviews.text: These are great shoes, and this is coming from someone super picky about the type of shoes they wear. They do run a bit big and stretch because they are leather. Definitely go a half size down at least.
customer_reviews.author: FaultyPetal

customer_reviews.title: Love the look of this shoe
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of this shoe. I highly recommend insoles. After eight hours on, my feet were screaming for relief.
customer_reviews.author: Kk

product_meta.title: Merrell Women's Around Town Mid Lace Fashion Sneaker
product_meta.description: This on the move mid lace up has full grain leather uppers, pigskin lining and contoured footbed. Urban explorers agree, fall is feeling good.
